assignments.description: Homework: Submit your solution to homework on Canvas as a pdf file.

Project: Final project topic is chosen by the students. You will do the project in a small group (up to 3 students per group). Each group will identify an application area and a related optimization problem within that area. The project will involve mathematical modeling and programming.
